Firewyrms live in tubes of molten lava found throughout the Plane of Fire. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Firewyrm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=190) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 149 **Perception** +16; darkvision, smoke vision **Languages** [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20 **Str** +5 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** -1 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 **Smoke Vision** The firewyrm ignores the concealed condition from smoke. --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +20 **Will** +15 **HP** 165 (explosion) **Immunities** bleed, fire, paralyzed, poison, sleep **Weaknesses** cold 10 **Explosion** ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) When the firewyrm dies, it explodes, dealing 6d6 fire damage to each creature in a 10-foot emanation (DC 28 basic Reflex save).
**Intense Heat** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) 10 feet, 4d6 fire, DC 25 basic Reflex. --- **Speed** 60 feet **Melee** tail +20 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+11 fire plus 2d8 persistent fire **Ranged** fire mote +20 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d8+6 fire **Breath Weapon** ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The firewyrm breathes a 30-foot cone of fire dealing 7d6 fire and 2d8 persistent fire damage to every creature within the cone (DC 28 basic Reflex save). The firewyrm can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
